translation.zh: （1994年4月 卢旺达境内 开始了针对图西族的大屠杀）
（胡图族和图西族的暴力冲突 在当时达到了高峰） （民族矛盾在20世纪初 由比利时殖民者激化）

translation.en: [announcer 1 on radio] Many believe it was not an accident but an assassination.
translation.zh: 很多人认为这不是意外 而是暗杀
少将朱韦纳尔哈比阿里马纳

translation.en: said that the RPF never abandoned their logic…
translation.zh: 声称卢旺达爱国阵线 从未放弃他们的逻辑 （新希望科学学院）

translation.en: [announcer 2 on radio] The big question is,
who shot down the president's plane,
translation.zh: 最大的问题为 是谁击落了总统的飞机

translation.en: and how would this turn of events further destabilize an already fragile…
translation.zh: 此变故会如何 令已经脆弱的局势更加动荡…

translation.en: [woman 1] None of us goes to the bathroom.

translation.zh: 我的躯体已经没有了生机
我的骨头开始日渐衰弱

translation.en: [woman 1] We never thought we'd be in here this long…
translation.zh: 我们从没想过会困在这里这么久
但我们将不可避免的事情延迟了

translation.en: I am writing this so that when they find our bodies,
translation.zh: 我写这封信的目的是 当有人发现我们的尸体时

translation.en: they will know how long we were here.
translation.zh: 他们会知道我们在这儿待了多久

translation.en: Have I told you my name?
[man] Annick! Ma puce! [in Kinyarwanda] I have one more.
translation.zh: 安妮可 宝贝！我又带来了一个人 （第一天）

translation.en: [in English] …when it is safe for you and for him to come out. Hmm?
translation.zh: 到时候你和他就能安全出来了

translation.en: marching across our farm with machetes.
translation.zh: 挥着大砍刀 大摇大摆地穿过我们的农场

translation.en: It will be okay, Mutesi. Hmm?

translation.zh: -弗朗索瓦… -你怎么知道我的名字？

translation.en: You told us yesterday when you came.
translation.zh: 你昨天来的时候告诉了我们

translation.en: Francois said he found you inside the well.
translation.zh: 弗朗索瓦说他在井里发现了你
你是胡图族的 肚子里怀了孩子

translation.en: -A boy. A Hutu boy who will-- -[nun shushing]
translation.zh: 是一个男孩 胡图族男孩会…

translation.en: My name is Jeanette. This is Annick.
translation.zh: 我叫珍妮特 这是安妮可

translation.en: I may face the same danger.
translation.zh: 我可能会面临同样的危险

translation.en: We are in my home, beneath the floor of my kitchen.
translation.zh: 我们在我家厨房的地板底下

translation.en: We built it ourselves. Good for storing food.
translation.zh: 这是我们自己建的储藏室 很适合储存食物

translation.en: We'll be safest here, a day or so,
translation.zh: 这里对于我们是最安全的 大概待一天吧

translation.en: -I'm… I'm just-- -Peyton. Here from the United States.
translation.zh: -我就是… -佩顿 你是美国来的
圣约瑟夫的一名志愿者

translation.en: [in English] It's almost dark. We can sneak there.
translation.zh: -天快黑了 我们可以偷偷去 -不行

translation.en: No. The risk is too great.
translation.zh: -天快黑了 我们可以偷偷去 -不行 -风险太大了 -那怎么办？

translation.en: Then what? Where are we supposed to pee?
translation.zh: -风险太大了 -那怎么办？ 我们要尿在哪儿？

translation.en: -We cannot. We need-- -What? What more can we need?
translation.zh: -不能这样 我们需要… -什么？我们还需要什么？

translation.en: Francois will give us everything we need.
translation.zh: 弗朗索瓦会提供我们需要的一切

translation.en: [in English] We are locked in here?
This room is for storing things, not intended for people to be inside.
translation.zh: 这是储藏室 不是让人待的

translation.en: It locks when the door closes.
translation.zh: 门一关 它就会锁上

translation.en: Francois says it will end quickly.
translation.zh: 弗朗索瓦说很快就会结束

translation.en: [Annick] Think about something else. That's what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 想想别的事 我就是这么做的

translation.en: [Peyton gasps] No, no, no. No, no, no.
Uh, I… I have an idea for a toilet, for now,
translation.zh: 我想到了个上厕所的办法 只是暂时的

translation.en: but I… I need your help.
Um, I… I think there's, like, a hole right here.
Five years. But we've known each other since we were very young.
translation.zh: 结婚五年了 但我们是青梅竹马

translation.en: Almost our whole lives. We were in primary school when he told me
translation.zh: 是从小一起长大的 还在上小学的时候 他就跟我说

translation.en: he had claimed me. I was his.
translation.zh: 我是他的人 他就将我据为己有了

translation.en: It is a good thing you've not had a child yet.
translation.zh: 幸好你的孩子还没有出生

translation.en: Times like these, he'd be out there chopping his friends.
translation.zh: 这种时势之下 他会在外面拿刀砍他的朋友

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Maybe he would chop you.
-[gun firing in distance] -[Annick] What about you, Peyton?

translation.zh: 但你是出于什么原因来？

translation.en: How do you be a nun

translation.zh: 怎么能坚定地当修女呢？

translation.en: God is not of this world.
He created it, but he is not of it.
translation.zh: 这个世界是他创造的 但他不属于这里

translation.en: But all we really know is what we can see, right?
translation.zh: 但眼见才能为实 对吧？

translation.en: What we can physically feel, you know? And anything can change, just like that.
translation.zh: 亲身所感才是真实的 知道吗？ 一切都可能会在一瞬间改变

translation.en: The world does seem that way.
You never know what is coming next.
translation.zh: 你永远不知道接下来会发生什么

translation.en: And… right when you think you do, it's completely something else.
translation.zh: 当你以为自己深谙世道时 就会天翻地覆

translation.en: That is why you have no children?
I assume they'd be here, not us.
translation.zh: 要是有 我猜在这里的会是他们 而不是我们

translation.en: Children have not been in God's plan for us.
translation.zh: 上帝没有计划让我们有孩子

translation.en: We have not been able to.

translation.zh: 这个男孩一定能顺利出生

translation.en: [boy 1] Christophe is going to stomp you so bad later.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗一会儿会狠狠打败你

translation.en: [boy 2 in English] Because Christophe was a cockroach.
translation.zh: 因为克里斯托夫是只蟑螂

translation.en: [man in Kinyarwanda] Hey! What are you doing?

translation.zh: 身份证 马上拿出来！

translation.en: -[boy 3 in English] We are Hutu, I swear. -[man] Shut up!
translation.zh: -我们是胡图人 我发誓 -闭嘴！
你父亲是戈德弗里德吧？

translation.en: This is not the time for games.
translation.zh: 现在不是闹着玩游戏的时候

translation.en: -You proud to be Hutu, boys? -[boy 2] Yes.
translation.zh: -小子们 为自己身为胡图人自豪吗？ -是的

translation.en: [man] This place, this land, is your birthright.
translation.zh: 这个地方 这片土地 就是你们与生俱来的权利

translation.en: And you, you are old enough.
You should have your identity card everywhere you go!
Don't you want it known you are the better race?
translation.zh: 你不想让人知道 你属于更高级的种族吗？

translation.en: This is the time for cleansing!

translation.zh: 做好你的本分 小弟

translation.en: The penalty today is one ball.
[man in English] Hey, hey! What are you doing over there?

translation.zh: 你 小弟 跟我来

translation.en: and then the right hand meets once in the middle,
translation.zh: 然后拿出右手在中间互拍一次

translation.en: [whispering] I'm serious. This is not a time for games.
translation.zh: 我没有开玩笑 现在不是玩游戏的时候

translation.en: What else are we supposed to do?

translation.zh: 盘子里有泡泡糖 泡泡糖

translation.en: How many pieces do you wish?
-[Peyton] Annick, you're not it. -[gun firing in distance]
-Oh, oh, oh. -[Peyton] Take your foot out.
So, what happens when you're it?
translation.zh: 如果是你 那会怎么样？

translation.en: Well, whoever's it has to chase…
translation.zh: 如果你被选中了 就要追…

translation.en: Five, six, seven, eight, try to keep your thumbs straight.
translation.zh: 五、六、七、八 努力伸直大拇指

translation.en: No, no, no, no. It's unsafe.
-We cannot leave her. -[Annick] Not with our voices.
translation.zh: -我们不能丢下她不管 -我们不能用嗓子喊

translation.en: We could throw something out there, get her attention.
translation.zh: 可以扔点东西出去 引起她的注意

translation.en: [man 1 in Kinyarwanda] I don't care if it tastes like piss,
translation.zh: 我不在乎是不是有尿味

translation.en: as long as it gets me drunk.

translation.zh: 我认识他 他叫帕斯卡

translation.en: You cannot trust him, no matter how well you know him.
translation.zh: 不管你跟他有多熟 都不能相信他

translation.en: [Pascal in Kinyarwanda] Look here, a cockroach!
translation.zh: 看看 这里有一只蟑螂！

translation.en: [Pascal in Kinyarwanda] Bring her along quick.
[Hutu soldier in English] This will end easy and painless for you if you tell us now.
translation.zh: 如果你现在告诉我们 这事就能轻易解决 毫无痛苦

translation.en: Ah, you think we won't find them? We found you.
translation.zh: 你以为我们找不到他们吗？ 我们找到你了

translation.en: It is my job to hunt them down.
translation.zh: 我的工作就是搜捕他们

translation.en: -If you won't tell us, well… -[woman] We all scattered so fast.
translation.zh: -如果你不告诉我们 那么… -我们很快就分散开了

translation.en: [Pascal] You do not want to feel this in your flesh.
translation.zh: 你不会想亲身感受这把刀有多锋利的

translation.en: You don't want your husband or your children to feel it either.
translation.zh: 你也不会想 让你的丈夫或孩子感受到

translation.en: If you tell us where they are, they won't have to.
translation.zh: 如果你告诉我们他们在哪里 他们就可以免受痛苦

translation.en: I will feed them each a bullet instead.
translation.zh: 我会给他们每人喂一颗子弹

translation.en: -You can stop this, please. -[Pascal] Oh, shut up!
translation.zh: -你可以阻止这一切 求求你 -闭嘴！

translation.en: You know, you really are a bitch!
And those ugly children, like an ugly dog. Look at me!
translation.zh: 还有那些丑陋的孩子 和其貌不扬的狗一样 看着我！

translation.en: [in English] I say she's more like a fat fucking cow ready to push out another one, eh?
translation.zh: 我觉得她更像是一头破肥牛 随时准备着再生一个崽子

translation.en: [Pascal] Where are you going, huh? Where are you going? Huh?
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？ 你要去哪里？

translation.en: -Take her over there! -Oh God, no! No!
[Pascal in Kinyarwanda] It's your turn, brother.
You will rot in hell for this!
translation.zh: 干这种事会让你烂在地狱里！

translation.en: -You will rot in hell-- -[Hutu soldier yelling]
She and her husband ran the main bakery.
translation.zh: 主面包店是她和她丈夫开的

translation.en: And the two who killed her… [sniffling]
Pascal, he used to sing in the choir.
translation.zh: 帕斯卡以前在唱诗班唱歌

translation.en: He had the most beautiful voice.
-No, we are alive because of her. -[sobbing] She was… She was…
translation.zh: -不 我们是因为她才活着 -她… 她…

translation.en: Why didn't you say she was pregnant?
translation.zh: 你为什么不说她有身孕？

translation.en: That would have made the difference? Only women who bear children matter?
translation.zh: 那样就不一样了？ 只有生孩子的女人才重要吗？

translation.en: -The rest are not worth your mercy? -[Jeanette] She has been merciful.
translation.zh: -其他人不值得你怜悯？ -她很仁慈
这是和上帝的怜悯有关

translation.en: -[Annick] There was nothing-- -Do not touch me!

translation.zh: 我们只听到了她的声音

translation.en: They would never kill a precious American.
translation.zh: 他们绝不会杀害矜贵的美国人

translation.en: Akimana should have been in this room.
translation.zh: 阿吉玛娜理应在这屋子里

translation.en: No, no. Shh. This is not God's truth.
translation.zh: 不 这不是上帝的真理

translation.en: -I know it is hard. -Are you mad or stupid?
translation.zh: -我知道这很难 -你是疯了还是笨？

translation.en: We must have faith and pray.
translation.zh: 我们必须心怀信仰 诚心祷告

translation.en: The Lord Jesus is always listening.
People are being slaughtered like sows in the street, and for what?
translation.zh: 人们在街上像母猪一样被宰杀 是为什么呢？
上帝会听所有人的声音

translation.en: He may not always give us the answer--
translation.zh: 他可能不会总是给我们答案…
像母猪一样 在街上被宰杀！

translation.en: People who have killed will have to answer for their transgressions

translation.zh: 为自己的罪过付出代价

translation.en: should ever have to suffer that.

translation.zh: 晚上的时候 我叔叔会…

translation.en: I know what that is like.
He would hurt my mother that way sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候会那样伤害我妈妈

translation.en: He would force himself on her.

translation.zh: 白人过来 说要弄身份证

translation.en: Said, "Hutu get this," said, "Tutsi get that."
translation.zh: 说：“这是给胡图族的” 说：“那是给图西族的”

translation.en: and tell me that those boys do not deserve to suffer in hell.
translation.zh: 告诉我那两个男孩不需要被打下地狱
我从来不敢评判任何人

translation.en: Because you'd have to judge your father for being a pig?
translation.zh: 因为你不得不评判你的父亲 说他是猪吗？

translation.en: And perhaps Akimana should have been in here,
translation.zh: 也许阿吉玛娜应该在这里

translation.en: Akimana is with the Lord now.
translation.zh: 阿吉玛娜现在在神的身边了

translation.en: we pray for the soul of Akimana Murenzi.
translation.zh: 我们为阿吉玛娜木伦兹的灵魂祷告

translation.en: They knew she had children missing.
translation.zh: 他们知道她有孩子失踪

translation.en: -[gun firing in distance] -Why would you hide us?
translation.zh: 你为什么愿意把我们藏起来？

translation.en: When the violence broke out, the militia was pillaging homes.
translation.zh: 暴力冲突爆发的时候 民兵分子开始掠夺家园

translation.en: Francois says they have lists of names.
translation.zh: 弗朗索瓦说他们有一份名单

translation.en: Names of Tutsi and of Hutu moderates.
translation.zh: 图西族和胡图族温和派的名字

translation.en: Francois is a teacher at a school for the education of both Tutsi and Hutu.
translation.zh: 弗朗索瓦是老师 既教图西族 也教胡图族

translation.en: We never believed Tutsi were better than us,
translation.zh: 我们从来不觉得图西族高我们一等

translation.en: no matter what prejudice you've seen
translation.zh: 不管你遇到过何种偏见

translation.en: or what you were told as children.
translation.zh: 或者我们从小被灌输的 是什么样的理念

translation.en: No person is better than any other.
And we must love ourselves to be able to love each other.
translation.zh: 我们必须爱自己 才能彼此相爱

translation.en: You were a lonely little girl.
You only listen to judge and not hear.
translation.zh: 你听风就是雨 妄下评论 别人的话你都听不进去

translation.en: You are right. I… I was a lonely little girl.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我的确曾是个孤独的小姑娘
你依然是孤独的小姑娘

translation.en: [in Kinyarwanda] What are you doing? What is this?
[in English] You hide food from us, and you have it all for yourself.
translation.zh: 你私藏食物 不让我们知道 只顾着给自己吃

translation.en: Stop! She came to feed the poor Africans.
translation.zh: 住手！ 她来给非洲穷人提供食物的

translation.en: [Annick] Mutesi, this is not for you to-- Stop this!
translation.zh: 穆特西 这不是给你…住手！

translation.en: -This is not-- -She was letting us starve!
[Peyton] No, I was saving it, in case…
translation.zh: 不 我是想留着 以防…

translation.en: What if we're in here for a while?
translation.zh: 要是我们要在这儿待上一段时间呢？

translation.en: I… I was going to share the food. I was.
translation.zh: 我本来是打算 将食物分享出去的 没骗你们

translation.en: I don't need your disgusting food.
translation.zh: 我不需要你的恶心食物

translation.en: there's no way to know if Francois is coming back.
translation.zh: 我们无从知道弗朗索瓦会不会回来

translation.en: So if… if this is all we have, then…
translation.zh: 所以如果我们只有这些食物 那么…

translation.en: [Jeanette] Father, bless this food. Forgive us our trespasses…
translation.zh: 天父 请保佑我们的食物 原谅我们的罪过…

translation.en: This is all I ever wanted,
translation.zh: 这是我一直以来的心愿

translation.en: Trust in God to give you the gifts you ask for.
translation.zh: 相信上帝 他会给把你想要的礼物都给你

translation.en: but I can't help asking what keeps Francois for so long.
translation.zh: 但我忍不住想问 弗朗索瓦为什么这么久还不回来

translation.en: he is thinking about you and that baby boy
translation.zh: 他都在想你和你肚子里的小男孩

translation.en: and doing everything he can to come back here.
God has given you a strong boy.
translation.zh: 上帝赐给你一个强壮的男孩

translation.en: Do you like that book, Peyton?
translation.zh: 你喜欢那本书吗 佩顿？
我觉得这是本经典读物

translation.en: Would you mind reading it to us?
I'm… I'm not very good at reading out loud. Um…
But… But you can read it.
I haven't tried reading English in a very long time,
translation.zh: 我已经很久没有试过读英文书了

translation.en: I could not read it well. [chuckles]
Really? You… You speak it perfectly.
translation.zh: 真的吗？你说英文很流利啊

translation.en: Most all Rwandans speak it, but we are not really taught the letters.
translation.zh: 大部分卢旺达人都会说这种语言 但我们没有学过字母

translation.en: It has nothing to do with that, not for me.
translation.zh: 这和种族无关 反正我的情况不是这样的

translation.en: My family and I have been goat farmers my whole life.
translation.zh: 我的家人和我一辈子都是养山羊的

translation.en: No more privileged than any Hutu.
translation.zh: 比胡图族人多不了多少特权

translation.en: I wanted to know the language.
"The seeds of love are planted round the world."
translation.zh: “爱的种子被种在了世界各地”
“它们被收拢起来 播撒出去”

translation.en: "Seeds of love are planted each and every day."
"They're part of life in every single way."
translation.zh: “在方方面面 它们都是生命的组成”

translation.en: I was afraid. I was afraid you were…
You must know that I will never, never leave you.
translation.zh: 你要知道 我永远都不会扔下你不管

translation.en: No, no, no. Stay… stay there. Stay hidden.

translation.zh: 和他爸爸一样 对吗？

translation.en: [Francois] It has been a bit of chaos.
But I remembered you had Peyton's food and some water already.
translation.zh: 但我记得 你们已经有了佩顿的食物和水

translation.en: I tried to come back to bring some more, but it has not been possible.
translation.zh: 我想带更多东西回来 但一直没有成功

translation.en: The UN is here to take you.
I… I am sorry, ma puce, but our time will come soon.
translation.zh: 对不起 宝贝 但很快就轮到我们了

translation.en: [Francois] The UN will come for the rest of us.
translation.zh: 联合国之后会来接剩下的人

translation.en: -I just… I don't understand-- -[Francois] Now. We must go now.
translation.zh: -我就是…我不明白 -快 我们得马上走

translation.en: [Peyton] It shouldn't… It shouldn't be me.
-I love you, ma puce. -[Annick] I love you too.
You are a child enough. Someone should be protecting you.
translation.zh: 你年纪也算是小孩子了 你应该被人保护

translation.en: -What if I can't keep you safe? -The UN's here.
translation.zh: -如果我不能保证你的安全 怎么办？ -联合国来了

translation.en: -They'll come back for us tomorrow. -One more day your mother worries.
translation.zh: -他们明天就会回来接我们 -那就要让你妈妈多担心一天

translation.en: My parents haven't worried about me in years.
translation.zh: 我的父母都好几年没担心过我了

translation.en: She should have left. She cuts our food rations by a fourth.
translation.zh: 她应该离开的 她要分四分之一的食物

translation.en: We would have starved already without her.
translation.zh: 即使没有她 我们也已经饿着肚子了

translation.en: Peyton, the love of a mother and a father is like nothing on this Earth.
translation.zh: 佩顿 地球上任何东西 都比不上父母对孩子的爱

translation.en: I like to imagine that that's real for every child, but, uh…
translation.zh: 我很愿意想象 所有孩子都能淹没在父母的爱里

translation.en: Some kids, they mess up bad enough, and there's no more chances after that.
translation.zh: 但有些孩子闯了太大的祸 导致后来再也没有机会了

translation.en: It's like love can't find them anymore.
translation.zh: 就像是爱已经无法找到他们了

translation.en: -Your mother's love-- -I killed my little brother.

translation.zh: 我们逮到他在那所学校里躲着

translation.en: He shitted himself like a frightened animal.
translation.zh: 他像受惊的动物一样 把屎拉在了裤裆上

translation.en: [in Kinyarwanda] We cut off his feet first so he could not run.
translation.zh: 我们先切掉了他的脚 这样他就跑不掉了

translation.en: Still, he would not tell us a thing
translation.zh: 但他还是什么都不跟我们说

translation.en: [Seba in English] He told us everything we needed to know.
translation.zh: 他把我们需要知道的一切都招了

translation.en: By then, he was in a lot of pain, so we tried to be merciful.
translation.zh: 那时他痛不欲生 所以我们尽量高抬贵手

translation.en: Offered him a bullet for only 7,000 francs.
translation.zh: 我们提出 他只用付七千块法郎 我们就可以送他一枚子弹

translation.en: So I slit his throat open.
[Hutu soldier] Seba, the commander is looking for you.
translation.zh: 塞巴 指挥官在找你

translation.en: [Seba in Kinyarwanda] Give me more time!
[Seba in Kinyarwanda] All right! Let's go.
But we will come back at sunup to find these cockroaches.
translation.zh: 但我们会在太阳升起时回来 揪出这些蟑螂

translation.en: The storm is loud enough to cover us.
translation.zh: 暴风雨的咆哮声足以掩护我们

translation.en: If we can get out of here,
we can get to the Mille Collines.
translation.zh: 就能成功抵达米勒科林斯酒店

translation.en: So many bodies in the street.
If you stay, we will all stay.
translation.zh: 如果你要留下 我们就都留下

translation.en: And I would rather die than let any man hurt me again.
translation.zh: 我宁愿死 也不会让任何男人再伤害我了

translation.en: If he is to be a strong boy, he must have a strong mother.
translation.zh: 如果要他成为一个坚强的男孩 他的母亲也必须坚强

translation.en: we are the sisters you never wanted.
translation.zh: 我们是你不曾相认的姐妹

translation.en: That is why we must leave.
[man] He said they are inside, in the kitchen. Quickly.
translation.zh: 他说她们在里面 在厨房里 快点

translation.en: We are safe. These men are RPF.
translation.zh: 我们安全了 这些人是卢旺达爱国阵线的

translation.en: They found the school, yes, yes.
translation.zh: 他们找到了学校 没错

translation.en: I left only for a few hours to bury Nafia. But when I returned…
translation.zh: 我离开了几个小时 去把纳菲亚埋了起来 但我回来时
是那个小女孩保护了我

translation.en: We survived 81 days in that room.
translation.zh: 我们在那间屋子里活了81天

translation.en: But we found the most important thing we never knew to look for,
translation.zh: 但我们找到了最重要的东西 之前却从未想过去寻找的东西
